content: a doubled 2x2 ribbed brim provides extra warmth in dawn catanzaro s folded brim hat knitted using just one skein of our silky-soft bulky merino/mohair ibis with 4-point crown shaping and unisex appeal this is a quick and satisfying project you ll want to work up again and again **yarn** ibis coldspring 611 / 1 skein **needles** 16 circular and set dpns in size us 11/ 8 mm **skills required** long-tail cast-on link from blog decreasing working in the round
